name: Invisible Maze 2.0
description:
I enjoyed the work I did on the invisible maze game I'd made for class, but it was compiled over the course of a month. So I decided, hey! Why not try to do it in an hour or so? So that's what this is: I set out at about 1:20 to create from absolute scratch an invisible maze. That means no blueprints, no existing code. And, if you're seeing this, I did it!

Credits:

Epic Games: The Unreal Engine

Myself: Everything else
